be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.view.controllers.collaborator

Class NotificationsViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.view.controllers.collaborator.NotificationsViewController

  • public class NotificationsViewController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the view for the controller of InvitationAnswered. It will display when the the user application (the one who has sent invitations) when his invited collaborators have answered (or not) his invitations.
